entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 March 2023
